author: MilanoBicocca-pix
body:
#### PR description:

This PR addresses the issue raised in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/19003
All the changes suggested in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/19003 are implemented.
The only modified files are:
-  PVFitter.h
-  PVFitter.cc 

The code compiles with no errors and no changes are seen in the BeamSpot fit results, as expected.
title: Fix memory leaks in PVFitter
